div.p: I mean everybody goes through that stage when you’re 14 or 15 you know like where you have troubles with your behaviour, school and sort of thing
but even though I started at that time sort of little bad behaviour but it never affected my grades I made sure of that like I had same grades I was getting before
and it didn’t affect it; I knew how to, even though I was bad, not bad but like behaving sort of you go through that stage I mean it was the fact that
I was away sort of you go through emotions, self emotions you know sometimes you reflect you think there’s no-one here for me and you kind of
want to take it on but I’m really glad that it lasted a very short period of time and if I had self-doubts I always go into deep sort of digging into self
and I always you know find something I mean like last in my thoughts thinking like I always find something good like that relates to that in a good way
and it sort of brings you back up again
